title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave, blue and yellow applied by brush
dimensions:
H x W: 45.7 x 71.1 cm (18 x 28 in.)
Repeat H x W: 28 x 25.4 cm (11 x 10 in.)
description: Printed cotton with a straight repeat of peony-like flowers on a fine vine in purples and reds on white background.
